00023 float MAX1704::stateOfCharge(){
00024 
00025     byte msb = 0;
00026     byte lsb = 0;
00027 
00028     readFrom(MAX1704_SOC,msb,lsb);
00029 
00030     float fraction = lsb / 256.0;
00031     float percentage = msb + fraction;
00032 
00033     return percentage;
00034 }
00035 
00036 void MAX1704::showConfig(){
00037 
00038     int threshold = alertThreshold();
00039     boolean sleep = isSleeping();
00040     boolean alert = isAlerting();
00041     byte v = version();
00042 
00043     Serial.print("Version = ");
00044     Serial.println(v, HEX);
00045     Serial.print("Sleep = ");
00046     Serial.println(sleep, HEX);
00047     Serial.print("Alert = ");
00048     Serial.println(alert, HEX);
00049     Serial.print("Alert Threshold = ");
00050     Serial.print(threshold, DEC);
00051     Serial.println("%");
00052 }
00053 
00054 void MAX1704::reset(){
00055 
00056     performCommand(MAX1704_POWER_ON_RESET, 0x00);
00057 }
00058 
00059 void MAX1704::quickStart(){
00060 
00061     performCommand(MAX1704_QUICK_START, 0x00);
00062 }
00063 
00064 char MAX1704::version(){
00065 
00066     int value = 0;
00067     byte msb = 0;
00068     byte lsb = 0;
00069     readFrom(MAX1704_VERSION, msb, lsb);
00070 
00071     value  = 0xFF00 & (msb<<8);
00072     value |=   0xFF & lsb;
00073 
00074     return value;
00075 }
00076 
00077 void MAX1704::setAlertThreshold(uint8_t level){
00078 
00079     Wire.beginTransmission(MAX1704_ADDR);
00080     Wire.write(MAX1704_CONFIG);
00081     Wire.write(MAX1704_ALERT_LEVEL);
00082     Wire.write(32 - level);
00083     Wire.endTransmission();
00084 }
00085 
00086 int MAX1704::alertThreshold(){
00087 
00088     byte msb = 0;
00089     byte lsb = 0;
00090 
00091     readFrom(MAX1704_CONFIG,msb,lsb);
00092     byte threshold = lsb & 0x1f;
00093 
00094     return 32 - threshold;
00095 }
00096 
00097 boolean MAX1704::isAlerting(){
00098 
00099     byte msb = 0;
00100     byte lsb = 0;
00101 
00102     readFrom(MAX1704_CONFIG,msb,lsb);
00103     byte alert = (lsb >>5) & 0x01;
00104 
00105     return int(alert) == 1;
00106 }
00107 
00108 boolean MAX1704::isSleeping(){
00109 
00110     byte msb = 0;
00111     byte lsb = 0;
00112 
00113     readFrom(MAX1704_CONFIG,msb,lsb);
00114     byte sleep = (lsb >>7) & 0x01;
00115 
00116     return int(sleep) == 1;
00117 }

00128 void MAX1704::performCommand(byte address, int value){
00129 
00130     Wire.beginTransmission(MAX1704_ADDR);
00131     Wire.write(MAX1704_COMMAND);
00132     Wire.write(address);
00133     Wire.write(value);
00134     Wire.endTransmission();
00135 }
00136 
00137 void MAX1704::readFrom(byte address, byte &msb, byte &lsb){
00138 
00139     Wire.beginTransmission(MAX1704_ADDR);
00140     Wire.write(address);
00141     Wire.endTransmission();
00142 
00143     Wire.requestFrom(MAX1704_ADDR, 2);
00144 
00145     int numread = Wire.available();
00146     //if (numread == 2) {
00147     msb = Wire.read();
00148     lsb = Wire.read();
00149     //}
00150     Wire.endTransmission();
00151 }
